TutorialsÂ¶

Here, you will find tutorials explaining how to utilize the different functionalities of NeSy4PPM. All tutorials can be downloaded and run from our Github.. The tutorials use the Sepsis cases log as a running example. List of available tutorials:

  1. Learning:

    1. Event log encoding: methods for encoding event logs into numeric vectors;

    2. NN model training: training LSTM or Transformer models using encoded log;

    3. Full learning: full pipeline for Neural model learning.

  2. Prediction: methods for predicting suffix using a trained Neural model and an external BK;

  3. End to end pipeline: combines Neural model learning and prediction.
